content:
The Russian agent who was collecting intelligence on defense forces on the Eastern Front was caught when trying to escape to the unrecognized Transnistria.

About thisShe reported March 6SBU.

According to the department, law enforcement officers detained the defendant when he was preparing to cross the border river, using hydraulic costs and flippers.

The detainee was a resident of Dnipropetrovsk region, who in the middle of "zero" graduated from Moscow State University and received a lawyer's diploma.

According to the available data, during his studies the man got into the field of view of the Russian special service. After release from the Russian university and returning to Ukraine, he did not carry out intelligence activity in favor of the Russian Federation.

However, the situation has changed after the start of a large -scale invasion of Russia. As the investigation was established, in 2023 he appealed to the local military enlistment office and mobilized to one of the Armed Forces brigades.

After enrollment in the military unit, he was subsequently sent to the positions of Ukrainian troops in the Bakhmut area.

Arriving in the frontline territory of Donetsk region, the man began to "drain" the occupiers information about the places of base and movement of the Armed Forces near the front line.

He conveyed intelligence information to a hostile chat bot, which is administered by representatives of the Russian military intelligence.

After several sessions of communication with the Russian special service, its agent, understanding the inevitability of punishment, fled from the area of base of his unit.

Then he reached the border of Vinnytsia on a taxi to get to the unrecognized Transnistria and hide from justice there.

The attacker was reported suspected of two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine:

  • Part 2 of Art. 111 (treason committed in martial law);
  • Part 4 of Art. 408 (desertion).

He is now in custody. He is threatened with life imprisonment.

Earlier three Russian spiesgot a long time.
